title: Add retention policy enforcement for AI-generated content and associated audit records

sections.text: Implement backend retention rules for AI-generated artifacts (emails, call notes, next-best-action recommendations) and their audit records, with configurable retention periods per tenant. Add scheduled cleanup that hard-deletes or anonymizes expired records while preserving referential integrity and preventing access via API/UI. Expose retention status/expiry metadata for admins to validate policy behavior without duplicating RBAC or audit event capture work.
